about_the_game:
"Macrocosm 2772 G.E.: Olympus" is a role-playing visual novel featuring a character statistics system that depends on the choices made by players.

The game takes place in an alternative future. The main character, Aron Oransky, works as the captain's assistant on the spaceship.

During the demo version of the game, the player will get acquainted with the main character, three main heroines, and other characters, learn about the history and rules of this world, and go through a series of trials.

Features

  • Intriguing plot

  • A new, unknown universe with its own history, countries, and culture

  • Three main heroines, each with their own stories, strengths, and weaknesses that influence the course of the narrative

  • Beautiful and unique character design

  • Use of comic and manga techniques

Gameplay

The game is a blend of visual novel, quest, and adventure genres. It offers a high degree of variability that impacts the unfolding story. This variability will depend on both direct choices made in dialogues and the finding and use of items in quest and adventure segments.
